page.title: 08ROADS OF FORFAR
page.content: {Main Roads}The Carnoustie route no.is A958.Another of the popular routes is the Perth Road which runs through Glamis, 3 miles from Forfar.The route no.is A94. {By-Pass}Forfar is going to have a by-pass in about 2 years.Digging work is about to start now.It will join up the Dundee and Brechin roads with a loop so that heavy vehicles will not have to go through Forfar and the road won't be so busy. {Safety/Danger}Safety in Forfar is quite a problem with its narrow, twisting streets and hills.The Dundee Loan is a hazard area and is worth improving.The Dundee-Forfar-Brechin road is one of the busiest in Tayside and is quite dangerous with heavy lorries, but we hope the new by-pass will soon solve all that.
